# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your experience and productivity. Given its exceptional quality and features, I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. For this unique opportunity, I propose a special introductory price of $100. This is an exclusive offer tailored to discerning buyers like yourself. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your life with our top-tier product! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
